queries.name: plannerProjects
queries.description: Get all projects with planning information including dates, completion percentage, and artwork details.

queries.name: findUsers
queries.description: Search for users within the current organisation by username. Returns partial matches.

queries.name: findUsersPage
queries.description: Search for users within the current organisation with pagination support.

queries.name: findUsersAndTeamsPage
queries.description: Search for both users and teams within the current organisation with pagination. Useful for assignment operations.

queries.name: findUsersInAnyOrganisation
queries.description: System admin only - Search for users across all organisations by username.

queries.name: getUser
queries.description: Get detailed information about a specific user by username.

queries.name: getPermissionGroups
queries.description: Admin only - Get all available permission groups for the current organisation.

queries.name: possibleTrophies
queries.description: Get all possible trophies/achievements that can be earned in the system.

queries.name: validateEmails
queries.description: Validate a list of email addresses for deliverability and check if they're already registered users.

queries.name: exportUserSearch
queries.description: Export user search results as a downloadable file. Returns a file ID.

queries.name: file
queries.description: Get file metadata and information by its ID.

queries.name: existsInArchive
queries.description: Check if a file exists in the archive storage.

queries.name: artworkZipStructure
queries.description: Get the file structure for a project artwork as it would appear in a downloaded zip file.

queries.name: mcArtworkZipStructure
queries.description: Get the file structure for a mediacenter artwork as it would appear in a downloaded zip file.

queries.name: shareZipStructure
queries.description: Get the file structure for a share as it would appear in a downloaded zip file.

queries.name: tempFileUploadUrl
queries.description: Get a temporary URL for uploading a file directly to storage.

queries.name: tempFileDownloadUrl
queries.description: Get a temporary URL for downloading a file directly from storage.

queries.name: tempUrlForVideo
queries.description: Get a temporary streaming URL for a video file.

queries.name: printSpecification
queries.description: Get a single print specification by its ID.

queries.name: printSpecifications
queries.description: Get all print specifications in the organisation.

queries.name: findShares
queries.description: Search for shares with optional filters. By default excludes read shares unless includeRead is true.

queries.name: share
queries.description: Get a single share by ID. Requires authentication and access to the share.

queries.name: anonymousShare
queries.description: Get a single anonymous share by ID. No authentication required, works with public share links.

queries.name: status
queries.description: System admin only - Get system status including renderer status, version info, and command/query statistics.

queries.name: hubSpotCompanies
queries.description: System admin only - Get all companies from HubSpot CRM.

queries.name: searchHubSpotContacts
queries.description: System admin only - Search for contacts in HubSpot CRM by email address.

queries.name: openAiImage
queries.description: Generate an image using OpenAI's DALL-E. Default size 1024x1024. Returns base64 encoded JSON.

queries.name: askForOneDrivePermission
queries.description: Get a URL to request OneDrive permissions for file integration.

queries.name: organisation
queries.description: Get organisation details by ID. If no ID provided, returns current user's organisation.

queries.name: organisations
queries.description: System admin only - Get all organisations in the system.

queries.name: organisationMediaCenterStorageStorage
queries.description: Admin only - Get mediacenter storage usage for a specific organisation with size in specified unit.

queries.name: mediaCenterStorageForAllOrganisations
queries.description: System admin only - Get mediacenter storage usage across all organisations.

queries.name: organisationAuditLogs
queries.description: Get login audit logs for the current organisation showing user access history.

queries.name: assistantQuery
queries.description: Query the AI assistant with a prompt. Returns a thread ID for retrieving responses.

queries.name: subscriptionProducts
queries.description: Get all available subscription products and pricing for purchasing/upgrading.

queries.name: webhookEventTypes
queries.description: Get all available webhook event types that can be subscribed to.

queries.name: tree
queries.description: Get all mediacenter folders for the current organisation as a flattened list. Reconstruct the tree structure using parent IDs.

queries.name: folder
queries.description: Get a single mediacenter folder by ID with its subfolders.

queries.name: itemsForFolder
queries.description: Search and retrieve mediacenter items (artworks and files) within a folder with optional filtering and pagination.

queries.name: itemsForOrganisation
queries.description: Search mediacenter items across the entire organisation with optional filtering and pagination.

queries.name: usersForFolder
queries.description: Get all users with access to a specific mediacenter folder and their permissions.

queries.name: mediaCenterArtwork
queries.description: Get a single mediacenter artwork by ID. Note: This retrieves a mediacenter artwork, not a project artwork.

queries.name: artworkLocationsForProjectArtwork
queries.description: Find all mediacenter locations where a project artwork is linked/stored.

queries.name: mediaCenterArtworkForProjectArtwork
queries.description: System admin only - Get the mediacenter artwork linked to a project artwork.

queries.name: mediaCenterTreeHistory
queries.description: Get the complete event history for a mediacenter folder tree.

queries.name: projects
queries.description: Search and filter projects with pagination. Returns projects visible to the current user.

queries.name: project
queries.description: Get a single project by its ID. Returns full project details including all artworks.

queries.name: artwork
queries.description: Get a single project artwork by its ID. Note: This retrieves a project artwork, not a mediacenter artwork.

queries.name: projectHistory
queries.description: Get the complete event history for a project, including all changes and actions performed.

queries.name: artworkHistory
queries.description: Get the complete event history for a project artwork, including revisions, comments, and state changes.

queries.name: artworksToApprove
queries.description: Get all project artworks awaiting approval by the current user.

queries.name: artworksToUpload
queries.description: Get all project artworks where the current user is assigned as a supplier and needs to upload a revision.

queries.name: openAIProjectSummary
queries.description: Generate an AI-powered project summary tailored to a specific audience (project manager, orderer, or graphics creator).

queries.name: artworkAIAnalysis
queries.description: Start an AI analysis of a project artwork. Returns a thread ID for retrieving the analysis results.

queries.name: projectHistorySummary
queries.description: Generate an AI summary of a project's history. Returns a thread ID for retrieving the summary.

queries.name: openProjectsCountByMonth
queries.description: Get the number of open projects per month for the past year. Useful for trend analysis and capacity planning.

queries.name: articles
queries.description: Search articles with optional filters on article number, name, GTIN, category, or brand. Returns paginated results.

queries.name: article
queries.description: Get a single article by its ID.

queries.name: articleCategories
queries.description: Get all article categories as a flattened list (includes hierarchy via lineage field).

queries.name: projectArtworksForArticle
queries.description: Get all project artworks linked to a specific article.

queries.name: mediaCenterArtworksForArticle
queries.description: Get all mediacenter artworks linked to a specific article.

queries.name: markets
queries.description: Get all available markets for organizing articles geographically.

queries.name: brands
queries.description: Get all available brands for organizing articles by brand.

queries.name: statistics
queries.description: Get comprehensive statistics and analytics for the organisation including approvals, storage, deliveries, and user metrics.

mutations.name: setDatesOnProject
mutations.description: Set or update the start and end dates for a project.

mutations.name: setDatesOnArtworks
mutations.description: Set or update the start and end dates for multiple artworks within a project.

mutations.name: createUser
mutations.description: Create a new user account within an organisation. Email invitation will be sent.

mutations.name: createUsersFromEmailString
mutations.description: Create multiple users from a list of email addresses. Sends invitations to all valid addresses.

mutations.name: setOwnUserRealName
mutations.description: Update the current user's first and last name.

mutations.name: updateUserAccountInfo
mutations.description: Update the current user's account information including address, phone, and work details.

mutations.name: setUserRealName
mutations.description: Admin only - Update another user's first and last name.

mutations.name: setAvatar
mutations.description: Upload and set an avatar image for the current user.

mutations.name: deleteUsers
mutations.description: Admin only - Delete users from an organisation. Removes access but preserves data.

mutations.name: changeOwnPassword
mutations.description: Change the current user's password. Requires providing the old password for verification.

mutations.name: changeOwnEmail
mutations.description: Request an email address change for the current user. Sends verification email to new address.

mutations.name: changePassword
mutations.description: Admin only - Change a user's password without requiring the old password.

mutations.name: consentToGeneralTerms
mutations.description: Accept the general terms and conditions for the current user.

mutations.name: setPermissionGroupForUsers
mutations.description: Admin only - Assign users to a permission group, controlling their access level and capabilities.

mutations.name: setUserEmail
mutations.description: Admin only - Change a user's email address directly without verification.

mutations.name: setEarlyAccess
mutations.description: Admin only - Grant or revoke early access program features for a user.

mutations.name: setFtpPassword
mutations.description: Admin only - Set FTP password for a user to enable file transfers.

mutations.name: createFileDownloadJob
mutations.description: Create a download job for a single file. Returns job ID for download from file service. Optionally package as zip.

mutations.name: createDownloadJob
mutations.description: Create a download job for multiple files with custom folder structure. Returns job ID for download from file service.

mutations.name: reRenderFile
mutations.description: Trigger re-rendering of a file (regenerates tiles, previews, and metadata).

mutations.name: reRenderColorSeparation
mutations.description: Trigger color separation re-rendering for a PDF file.

mutations.name: deleteBarcode
mutations.description: Delete a detected barcode from a file.

mutations.name: modifyBarcode
mutations.description: Modify the position or boundaries of a detected barcode on a file.

mutations.name: createPrintSpecification
mutations.description: Create a new print specification with default values. Returns the created specification's ID.

mutations.name: requestUpdateForPrintSpecification
mutations.description: Request an update form for a print specification, optionally sending it to a specific email address.

mutations.name: updatePrintSpecification
mutations.description: Update an existing print specification with new packaging, print, decor, or instruction details.

mutations.name: deletePrintSpecification
mutations.description: Delete a print specification.

mutations.name: removeShares
mutations.description: Delete one or more shares, removing access for recipients.

mutations.name: markShareAsRead
mutations.description: Mark a share as read by the current user.

mutations.name: createShare
mutations.description: Create a share and send it to specified email addresses. Recipients must have accounts to access.

mutations.name: createAnonymousShare
mutations.description: Create an anonymous share that can be accessed via a public link without requiring an account.

mutations.name: markAllSharesAsRead
mutations.description: Mark all shares received by the current user as read.

mutations.name: createHubSpotContactIfMissing
mutations.description: System admin only - Create a HubSpot contact for a user if they don't already exist in CRM.

mutations.name: createHubSpotContactForAllUsers
mutations.description: System admin only - Create HubSpot contacts for all users in the system.

mutations.name: updateHubSpotContactToCustomer
mutations.description: System admin only - Update a HubSpot contact's lifecycle stage to customer.

mutations.name: updateAllHubSpotContactsToCustomer
mutations.description: System admin only - Update all HubSpot contacts' lifecycle stage to customer.

mutations.name: reindexShare
mutations.description: System admin only - Reindex a share in the search system.

mutations.name: updateOrganisationBaseInformation
mutations.description: Admin only - Update organisation name and description.

mutations.name: setOrganisationLogo
mutations.description: Admin only - Set the organisation's logo image.

mutations.name: createArtworkCategory
mutations.description: Create a new artwork category for organizing artworks within the organisation.

mutations.name: changeNameAndDescriptionOfCategory
mutations.description: Update the name and description of an existing artwork category.

mutations.name: setArtworkCategoryAsDefault
mutations.description: Set an artwork category as the default for new artworks.

mutations.name: archiveArtworkCategories
mutations.description: Archive artwork categories (hide them but preserve existing usage).

mutations.name: unArchiveArtworkCategories
mutations.description: Restore archived artwork categories.

mutations.name: deactivateOrganisations
mutations.description: System admin only - Deactivate organisations, preventing access to the system.

mutations.name: activateOrganisations
mutations.description: System admin only - Reactivate previously deactivated organisations.

mutations.name: startSubscriptionPaymentFlow
mutations.description: Start the payment flow for a subscription. Returns a URL to Stripe checkout.

mutations.name: cancelSubscription
mutations.description: Cancel the current subscription. Access continues until period end.

mutations.name: endTrial
mutations.description: End trial period early and require subscription payment.

mutations.name: changeSubscription
mutations.description: Change to a different subscription plan. Prorates charges/credits.

mutations.name: updatePaymentMethod
mutations.description: Get a URL to Stripe portal for updating payment methods.

mutations.name: setDesktopTheme
mutations.description: Customize the desktop application theme colors and wallpaper for the organisation.

mutations.name: createUserTeam
mutations.description: Create a new user team for organizing users. Team ID will be generated if not provided.

mutations.name: setUserTeamNameAndDescription
mutations.description: Update the name and description of a user team.

mutations.name: deleteUserTeam
mutations.description: @deprecated. Use deleteUserTeams(teamIds: [UUID!]!)

mutations.name: deleteUserTeams
mutations.description: Delete one or more user teams.

mutations.name: addUsersToTeam
mutations.description: Add users to a team with optional admin privileges.

mutations.name: removeUsersFromTeam
mutations.description: Remove users from a team.

mutations.name: setUserAsTeamAdmin
mutations.description: Grant or revoke team admin privileges for a user.

mutations.name: changeUserTeamApprovalMode
mutations.description: Change the approval mode for a team (ALL_REQUIRED or ANY_MEMBER).

mutations.name: addApiKey
mutations.description: Add an API key for programmatic access to the system with specified scopes.

mutations.name: removeApiKey
mutations.description: Remove an API key, revoking its access.

mutations.name: createEnterpriseSubscription
mutations.description: System admin only - Create an enterprise subscription without payment flow for manual billing.

mutations.name: createWebhook
mutations.description: Create a webhook to receive event notifications at a specified URL.

mutations.name: updateWebhook
mutations.description: Update an existing webhook configuration.

mutations.name: removeWebhook
mutations.description: Remove a webhook, stopping event notifications.

mutations.name: setCommunicationSettings
mutations.description: Update communication settings for the organisation, such as default email notification preferences.

mutations.name: createFolder
mutations.description: Create a new subfolder within an existing mediacenter folder.

mutations.name: createRootFolder
mutations.description: Create a new root-level folder in the mediacenter. Requires special permissions.

mutations.name: renameFolder
mutations.description: Rename a mediacenter folder.

mutations.name: moveFolder
mutations.description: Move a mediacenter folder to a new parent location. Can specify position relative to target.

mutations.name: copyFolder
mutations.description: Copy a mediacenter folder and all its contents to a new location.

mutations.name: deleteFolder
mutations.description: Delete a mediacenter folder and all its contents. Use with caution.

mutations.name: addUserToFolder
mutations.description: Grant a user access to a mediacenter folder with specific permissions (write, manage, share, download).

mutations.name: changeFolderUserPermission
mutations.description: Change the permissions for a user who already has access to a mediacenter folder.

mutations.name: removeUserFromFolder
mutations.description: Remove a user's access to a mediacenter folder.

mutations.name: addArtworkToFolder
mutations.description: Add a mediacenter artwork to a folder (creates a link/reference).

mutations.name: addFileToFolder
mutations.description: Add a file to a mediacenter folder.

mutations.name: obsoleteFolderItem
mutations.description: Mark a mediacenter item (artwork or file) as obsolete without deleting it.

mutations.name: unObsoleteFolderItem
mutations.description: Restore a mediacenter item from obsolete status.

mutations.name: changeFolderItemName
mutations.description: Rename a mediacenter item (artwork or file).

mutations.name: moveFolderItems
mutations.description: Move mediacenter items from one folder to another.

mutations.name: copyFolderItems
mutations.description: Copy mediacenter items to another folder.

mutations.name: removeFolderItem
mutations.description: Remove a mediacenter item from a folder (deletes the item).

mutations.name: commentMediaCenterArtwork
mutations.description: @deprecated(reason: "Use commentMediaCenterArtworks instead")

mutations.name: commentMediaCenterArtworks
mutations.description: Add comments with optional annotations to mediacenter artworks. Comments can include markers and attached files.

mutations.name: inValidateMediaCenterArtworkComment
mutations.description: Mark a comment on a mediacenter artwork as invalid/deleted.

mutations.name: validateMediaCenterArtworkComment
mutations.description: Restore a previously invalidated comment on a mediacenter artwork.

mutations.name: convertFileIntoMediaCenterArtwork
mutations.description: Convert a file in the mediacenter into a mediacenter artwork with typed files (source, delivery, resource).

mutations.name: setMCArtworkFiles
mutations.description: Set/replace all files on a mediacenter artwork with typed files (source, delivery, preview, resource).

mutations.name: snapshotTree
mutations.description: Create a snapshot of the mediacenter folder tree for backup/versioning purposes.

mutations.name: rollbackTree
mutations.description: Rollback mediacenter folder tree to a specific event, undoing all changes after that point. Use with caution.

mutations.name: removeEventsFromTree
mutations.description: Remove specific events from mediacenter folder tree history.

mutations.name: setMediaCenterArtworksDraft
mutations.description: Mark mediacenter artworks as draft (hidden from normal views) or published (visible).

mutations.name: saveMCArtworkPrintCoverage
mutations.description: Save print coverage analysis data for a mediacenter artwork, including print and color canvas information.

mutations.name: addArticleToMCArtwork
mutations.description: Link an article/product to a mediacenter artwork.

mutations.name: removeArticleFromMCArtwork
mutations.description: Unlink an article/product from a mediacenter artwork.

mutations.name: changeMCArtworkCategory
mutations.description: Change the category of a mediacenter artwork. Cannot be used on artworks synchronized from projects.

mutations.name: createArtwork
mutations.description: Create a new project artwork within an existing project.

mutations.name: createArtworksFromFiles
mutations.description: Create multiple project artworks from existing files. Each file becomes a separate artwork.

mutations.name: createArtworksFromMediaCenterArtworks
mutations.description: Create project artworks by copying from mediacenter artworks. Links the project artwork to the mediacenter artwork.

mutations.name: createArtworksFromProjectArtworks
mutations.description: Create new project artworks by copying from existing project artworks (within or across projects).

mutations.name: createProject
mutations.description: Create a new project. Can optionally attach files or mediacenter artworks during creation.

mutations.name: deleteProjects
mutations.description: Delete one or more projects. Use force=true to delete projects that are not in a deleteable state.

mutations.name: launchProjects
mutations.description: @deprecated - no need to launch when planned state is removed

mutations.name: closeProjects
mutations.description: Close one or more projects, marking them as completed. Use force=true to close projects not in closeable state.

mutations.name: reopenProjects
mutations.description: Reopen previously closed projects, allowing further work to be done.

mutations.name: assignUsersToArtworks
mutations.description: Assign multiple users to multiple project artworks with specific roles (approver, receiver, supplier) in a single operation.

mutations.name: addUserToArtwork
mutations.description: Add a user to a project artwork (legacy operation, prefer assignUsersToArtworks for batch operations).

mutations.name: assignApproverToArtwork
mutations.description: Assign a user as an approver to a project artwork. Approvers can approve or reject the artwork.

mutations.name: assignReceiverToArtwork
mutations.description: Assign a user as a receiver to a project artwork. Receivers are notified when the artwork is delivered.

mutations.name: assignSupplierToArtwork
mutations.description: Assign a user as a supplier to a project artwork. Suppliers are responsible for uploading revisions.

mutations.name: removeApproverFromArtwork
mutations.description: Remove a user's approver role from a project artwork.

mutations.name: removeReceiverFromArtwork
mutations.description: Remove a user's receiver role from a project artwork.

mutations.name: removeSupplierFromArtwork
mutations.description: Remove a user's supplier role from a project artwork.

mutations.name: removeAllAssignmentsForUserFromArtwork
mutations.description: Remove all role assignments (approver, receiver, supplier) for a user from a project artwork.

mutations.name: attachTeamToArtwork
mutations.description: Attach a team from the organisation to an artwork with specified assignments.

mutations.name: removeTeamFromArtwork
mutations.description: Remove a team from an artwork.

mutations.name: addTeamAssignmentToArtwork
mutations.description: Add an assignment type (APPROVER/RECEIVER/SUPPLIER) to a team on an artwork.

mutations.name: removeTeamAssignmentFromArtwork
mutations.description: Remove an assignment type from a team on an artwork.

mutations.name: addUserToArtworkTeam
mutations.description: Add a user to a team on an artwork.

mutations.name: removeUserFromArtworkTeam
mutations.description: Remove a user from a team on an artwork.

mutations.name: changeArtworkTeamApprovalMode
mutations.description: Change the approval mode for a team on an artwork.

mutations.name: removeSubApprovalForUser
mutations.description: Remove a sub-approver's approval from a project artwork, optionally providing a reason.

mutations.name: deliverProject
mutations.description: Mark a project as delivered to the client.

mutations.name: changeBasicProjectData
mutations.description: Edit basic project data like name, description, dates, and order number.

mutations.name: changeOrderer
mutations.description: Change the orderer (client) of a project. Requires appropriate permissions.

mutations.name: setProjectManager
mutations.description: Assign or change the project manager responsible for overseeing the project.

mutations.name: approveArtwork
mutations.description: Approve a project artwork. The approver must be assigned to the artwork and the artwork must be in an approvable state.

mutations.name: rejectArtwork
mutations.description: Reject a project artwork with an optional comment. Can optionally reset other users' approvals.

mutations.name: addCorrection
mutations.description: Add a correction (comment with annotations) to a project artwork. Can include markers and attached files.

mutations.name: newRevisionFromFile
mutations.description: Upload a new revision for a project artwork from an existing file. Optionally include a comment explaining changes.

mutations.name: createBriefFromFile
mutations.description: Attach a brief document (reference file) to a project artwork.

mutations.name: invalidateCorrection
mutations.description: Mark a correction as invalid/deleted. Invalid corrections are hidden from the approval workflow.

mutations.name: validateCorrection
mutations.description: Restore a previously invalidated correction, making it visible again.

mutations.name: exportProjectToFile
mutations.description: Export a project and all its artworks to a downloadable file. Returns the file ID for download.

mutations.name: remindApprover
mutations.description: Send a reminder email to an approver who hasn't yet approved or rejected a project artwork.

mutations.name: changeArtworkName
mutations.description: Change the name of a project artwork.

mutations.name: approveArtworks
mutations.description: Approve multiple project artworks at once. Current user must be assigned as approver to all artworks.

mutations.name: rejectArtworks
mutations.description: Reject multiple project artworks at once. Current user must be assigned as approver to all artworks.

mutations.name: revokeArtworkApprovalOrRejection
mutations.description: @deprecated. Remove this

mutations.name: revokeArtworkApproval
mutations.description: Revoke approval status from project artworks, allowing them to be worked on again. Requires appropriate permissions.

mutations.name: revokeArtworkRejection
mutations.description: Revoke rejection status from project artworks, allowing them to be resubmitted. Requires appropriate permissions.

mutations.name: startArtworks
mutations.description: Mark project artworks as started/in progress.

mutations.name: bundleArtworks
mutations.description: Bundle project artworks for delivery. Sets artwork files and transitions to bundled state.

mutations.name: deliverArtworks
mutations.description: Deliver project artworks to receivers. Optionally include a delivery message. Triggers notifications.

mutations.name: revokeBundlingOfArtworks
mutations.description: Revoke bundling status from project artworks, returning them to their previous state.

mutations.name: cancelArtworks
mutations.description: Cancel project artworks, marking them as canceled and removing them from active work.

mutations.name: deleteArtworks
mutations.description: Permanently delete project artworks from the project.

mutations.name: revokeDeliveryOfArtworks
mutations.description: Revoke delivery of project artworks, returning them to bundled state. Useful for fixing delivery mistakes.

mutations.name: rejectAndChangeDeliveredArtworks
mutations.description: Reject delivered project artworks and change their state. Requires special permissions.

mutations.name: changeCategoryOfArtworks
mutations.description: Change the category of multiple project artworks at once.

mutations.name: removeAllAssignmentsFromArtworks
mutations.description: Remove all user assignments (approvers, receivers, suppliers) from project artworks.

mutations.name: addArtworkActions
mutations.description: Add actions to multiple project artworks (e.g., deliver to mediacenter, create color proof).

mutations.name: removeArtworkActions
mutations.description: Remove actions from multiple project artworks.

mutations.name: finishArtworkActions
mutations.description: Mark actions as completed on multiple project artworks.

mutations.name: resetArtworkActions
mutations.description: Reset completed actions on multiple project artworks to incomplete state.

mutations.name: updateProjectNotes
mutations.description: Update or set the notes field on a project (internal notes visible to project team).

mutations.name: setProjectArtworkFiles
mutations.description: Set/replace all files on a project artwork with typed files (source, delivery, resource). Optionally set bundled state.

mutations.name: addArtworkFiles
mutations.description: Add additional files to a project artwork. Does not replace existing files. Optionally set bundled state.

mutations.name: synchronizeArtworksWithMediaCenter
mutations.description: Synchronize multiple project artworks with their linked mediacenter artworks, updating content and metadata.

mutations.name: synchronizeArtworkWithMediaCenter
mutations.description: @deprecated use synchronizeArtworksWithMediaCenter(artworkIds: [UUID!]!): Boolean!

mutations.name: addFilesToProject
mutations.description: Add reference or supporting files to a project (not tied to specific artworks).

mutations.name: removeFilesFromProject
mutations.description: Remove reference files from a project.

mutations.name: replacePreviewFile
mutations.description: Replace the preview/thumbnail file for a project artwork.

mutations.name: rollBackProjectHistory
mutations.description: Rollback project history to a specific event, undoing all events after that point. Use with caution.

mutations.name: revertProjectEvents
mutations.description: Revert specific project events by ID. More targeted than rollback.

mutations.name: setInvoiceNumber
mutations.description: Set or update the invoice number for a project artwork (for billing/accounting purposes).

mutations.name: savePrintCoverage
mutations.description: Save print coverage analysis data for a project artwork, including print and color canvas information.

mutations.name: createCollaborationForArtworks
mutations.description: Create external collaboration links for project artworks, allowing non-users to view/comment via email.

mutations.name: removeCollaborationForArtworks
mutations.description: Remove a collaboration link from a project artwork.

mutations.name: addArtworkRule
mutations.description: Add a validation rule to a project artwork (e.g., bleed requirements, color space).

mutations.name: removeArtworkRule
mutations.description: Remove a validation rule from a project artwork.

mutations.name: changeArtworkRule
mutations.description: Modify an existing validation rule on a project artwork.

mutations.name: checkoutArtwork
mutations.description: Check out a project artwork for editing (creates a work copy for desktop editing).

mutations.name: checkinArtwork
mutations.description: Check in a project artwork after editing, uploading the modified files.

mutations.name: setProjectsSilent
mutations.description: Set projects to silent mode (suppress email notifications) or unset silent mode.

mutations.name: createArticle
mutations.description: Create a new article. Returns the created article's ID.

mutations.name: updateArticle
mutations.description: @deprecated(reason: "Use updateArticles instead")

mutations.name: updateArticles
mutations.description: Update one or more articles with new information. Null values are not changed except brandId/marketId (null removes them).

mutations.name: deleteArticle
mutations.description: @deprecated(reason: "Use deleteArticles instead")

mutations.name: deleteArticles
mutations.description: Delete one or more articles.

mutations.name: setArticleCategories
mutations.description: Set categories for multiple articles at once, replacing all existing categories.

mutations.name: setArticleMarket
mutations.description: Set market for multiple articles at once. Null removes the market.

mutations.name: setArticleBrand
mutations.description: Set brand for multiple articles at once. Null removes the brand.

mutations.name: createArticleCategory
mutations.description: Create a new article category with optional parent for hierarchy.

mutations.name: renameArticleCategory
mutations.description: Rename an article category.

mutations.name: deleteArticleCategory
mutations.description: Delete an article category.

mutations.name: moveArticleCategory
mutations.description: Move an article category to a different parent in the hierarchy.

mutations.name: createMarket
mutations.description: Create a new market for geographical organization.

mutations.name: updateMarket
mutations.description: Update a market's name.

mutations.name: createBrand
mutations.description: Create a new brand. UUID will be generated if not supplied.

mutations.name: updateBrand
mutations.description: Update a brand's name.

input_fields.name: folderId
input_fields.description: if not supplied one will be generated for you

fields.name: artworkPermissions
fields.description: Will not work in subscriptions for now

fields.name: created
fields.description: timestamp

input_fields.name: categoryId
input_fields.description: Will use default if not provided

input_fields.name: artworkId
input_fields.description: Will be generated if not provided

input_fields.name: artworkName
input_fields.description: Will use the filename if not provided

types.name: Category
types.description: The artwork category specified by the organisation

fields.name: number
fields.description: Serial number of correction (begins with 1 and increases from oldest corrections to newest)

input_fields.name: shareId
input_fields.description: will be generated if not provided

input_fields.name: brandId
input_fields.description: if brand is known. Overrides brandName

input_fields.name: brandName
input_fields.description: matches existing brand names or creates a new brand. Overridden by brandId

input_fields.name: categoryNames
input_fields.description: matchies existing category names or creates the path. Overridden by categoryId

types.name: CreateArtworkInput
types.description: Input for creating a project artwork

input_fields.name: projectId
input_fields.description: Will be generated if not supplied

input_fields.name: shareId
input_fields.description: will be generated if not provided

fields.name: id
fields.description: Temporary id used for mapping to tree. Do not save

types.name: File
types.description: The file representaion in the system.

fields.name: created
fields.description: timestamp

fields.name: invoicePdf
fields.description: slower query. Request on demand

fields.name: organisationMemberships
fields.description: List of organisations that the current user is a member of

fields.name: currentOrganisation
fields.description: Currently selected organisation

fields.name: impersonatedBy
fields.description: set to impersonating users username if impersonated

fields.name: organisationName
fields.description: Not always set

types.name: MonthlyOpenProjectsCount
types.description: Count of open projects for a specific month

fields.name: active
fields.description: Is this an active organisation? If not it cannot be interacted with.

fields.name: refOrderNo
fields.description: The Purchase Order number

fields.name: files
fields.description: not available over subscription

types.name: ProjectFilter
types.description: A filter to reduce the number of projects

input_fields.name: name
input_fields.description: Searches in name, descriptions, filecontent and barcodes

fields.name: comment
fields.description: Any comment made when creating this revision

fields.name: closed
fields.description: Is this a closed revision, eg. the latest?

fields.name: messageSent
fields.description: Has all messages been sent about this revision

fields.name: revisionEvents
fields.description: The list of corrs for the revisions

fields.name: file
fields.description: The preview file of the revision (or today the actual revision file as a pdf)

fields.name: id
fields.description: unique event id to trigger changes

fields.name: name
fields.description: The name of the user using FirstName LastName

fields.name: organisationMemberships
fields.description: Admin only for other users

fields.name: addedBy
fields.description: The user that added this user to the current organisation

fields.name: addedAt
fields.description: When the user was added to the current organisation

fields.name: approvalMode
fields.description: Approval mode for the team. Defaults to ALL_REQUIRED if not set.
